description: DNS contains the configuration for Domains used by the gardener installation for more information, please see: https://github.com/gardener/gardener/blob/master/docs/extensions/dns.md

credentials.description: Credentials contains the credentials for the dns provider Expected format of the credentials depends on the the provider

provider.description: Provider is the DNS provider name of the given domain's zone depends on the DNS extension of your choice For instance, when using Gardener External-dns-management as the DNS extension, you can find all the supported providers in the controller registration at https://github.com/gardener/external-dns-management/blob/master/examples/controller-registration.yaml

zone.description: Zone is the applicable cloud provider zone
